references.name: Thiago Fernandes Custodio, Solution Architect, EPAM Systems
references.reference: Leonid joint the project and quickly learned the technology stack we were using. During his participation he always came with great quality code, fully tested and even provided feedback about the requirements and possible issues. He was on a different timezone, but he managed to stay after his working hours to overlay customers timezone and provide support when needed. He is a nice person and a great team member which always provided good feedback on peer's code and helped onboarding new team members.

references.name: Aibulat Akhmentov, Team Lead, EPAM Systems
references.reference: Throughout the work on the project I was repeatedly convinced that Leonid has a well-developed problem-solving skill. He perfectly understood the root cause of a problem and could effectively solve it. Moreover, the solutions were not some kind of crutches. In one case, the proposed and implemented solution was highly versatile that we started used it in different application modules. Ultimately, this allowed us to reduce amount of code and improve maintainability.

references.name: Alexandr Usynin, Resource Manager, EPAM Systems
references.reference: Leonid is a competent full stack developer. With deep knowledge in databases and clouds (AZURE and AWS). This is confirmed by excellent feedbacks from projects and certificates. In addition to project activities, ру proved himself as a L&D mentor (22 times, 5 different mentoring programs) and community speaker (5 times), participated in project interviews as an interviewer.
